role","_admin":"bool indicates if the role is an admin role","_orgId":"unique id of the organization to which the role belongs","_roleId":"unique id for the role","_voter":"bool indicates if the role node"}},"addSubOrg(string,string,string,string,uint16,uint16,address)":{"details":"_enodeId is optional. parent org id should contain the complete org hierarchy from master org id to the immediate parent. status"},"updateNodeStatus(string,string,string,uint16,uint16,uint256,address)":{"params":{"_action":"1-deactivate, 2-activate back, 3-blacklist the node","_enodeId":"enode id being dded to the node"}},"updateOrgStatus(string,uint256,address)":{"params":{"_action":"1 for suspending an org and 2 for revoke of suspension","_orgId":"unique id of the organization"}},"validateAccount(address,string)":{"params":{"_account":"account id","_orgId":"organization id"},"return":"true/false"}},"title":"Permissions Implementation Contract"},"userdoc":{"methods":{"addAdminAccount(address)":{"notice":"as a part of network initialization add all accounts which are passed via permission-config.json as network administrator accounts"},"addAdminNode(string,string,uint16,uint16)":{"notice":"as a part of network initialization add all nodes which are part of static-nodes.json as nodes belonging to network admin org"},"addNewRole(string,string,uint256,bool,bool,address)":{"notice":"function to add new role definition to an organization can be executed by the org admin account only"},"addNode(string,string,string,uint16,uint16,address)":{"notice":"function to add a new node to the organization. can be invoked org admin account only"},"addOrg(string,string,string,uint16,uint16,address,address)":{"notice":"function to add a new organization to the network. creates org record and marks it as pending approval. adds the passed node node manager contract. adds the account with org admin role to account manager contracts. creates voting record for approval by other network admin accounts"},"addSubOrg(string,string,string,string,uint16,uint16,address)":{"notice":"function to create a sub org under a given parent org."},"approveAdminRole(string,address,address)":{"notice":"function to approve network admin/org admin role assigment this can be executed by network admin accounts only."},"approveBlacklistedAccountRecovery(string,address,address)":{"notice":"function to initaite blacklisted nodes recovery. this can be invoked by an network admin account only"},"approveBlacklistedNodeRecovery(string,string,string,uint16,uint16,address)":{"notice":"function to initiate blacklisted nodes recovery. this can be invoked by an network admin account only"},"approveOrg(string,string,string,uint16,uint16,address,address)":{"notice":"functions to approve a pending approval org record by networ admin account. once majority votes are received the org is marked as approved"},"approveOrgStatus(string,uint256,address)":{"notice":"function to approve org status change. the org status is changed once the majority votes are received from network admin accounts."},"assignAccountRole(address,string,string,address)":{"notice":"function to assigns a role id to the account given account can be executed by org admin account only"},"assignAdminRole(string,address,string,address)":{"notice":"function to assign network admin/org admin role to an account this can be executed by network admin accounts only. it assigns the role to the accounts and creates voting record for network admin accounts"},"connectionAllowed(string,string,uint16)":{"notice":"checks if the node is allowed to connect or not"},"constructor":"constructor accepts the contracts addresses of other deployed contracts of the permissions model","getNetworkBootStatus()":{"notice":"function to fetch network boot status"},"getPendingOp(string)":{"notice":"function to fetch detail of any pending approval activities for network admin organization"},"getPolicyDetails()":{"notice":"returns various permissions policy related parameters"},"init(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"called at the time of network initialization. sets up network admin org with allowed sub org depth and breadth creates the network admin for the network admin org sets the default values required by account manager contract"},"isNetworkAdmin(address)":{"notice":"function to check if passed account is an network admin account"},"isOrgAdmin(address,string)":{"notice":"function to check if passed account is an org admin account"},"removeRole(string,string,address)":{"notice":"function to remove a role definition from an organization can be executed by the org admin account only"},"setMigrationPolicy(string,string,string,bool)":{"notice":"when migrating implementation contract, the values of these key values need to be set from the previous implementation contract. this function allows these values to be set"},"setPolicy(string,string,string)":{"notice":"for permissions its necessary to define the initial admin org id, network admin role id and default org admin role id. this sets these values at the time of network boot up"},"startBlacklistedAccountRecovery(string,address,address)":{"notice":"function to initaite blacklisted nodes recovery. this can be invoked by an network admin account only"},"startBlacklistedNodeRecovery(string,string,string,uint16,uint16,address)":{"notice":"function to initiate blacklisted nodes recovery. this can be invoked by an network admin account only"},"transactionAllowed(address,address,uint256,uint256,uint256,bytes)":{"notice":"checks if the account is allowed to transact or not"},"updateAccountStatus(string,address,uint256,address)":{"notice":"function to update account status. can be executed by org admin account only."},"updateNetworkBootStatus()":{"notice":"once the network initialization is complete, sets the network boot status to true"},"updateNodeStatus(string,string,string,uint16,uint16,uint256,address)":{"notice":"function to update node status. can be invoked by org admin account only"},"updateOrgStatus(string,uint256,address)":{"notice":"function to update the org status. it updates the org status and adds a voting item for network admins to approve"},"validateAccount(address,string)":{"notice":"function to validate the account for access change operation"}},"notice":"This contract holds implementation logic for all permissions related functionality. This can be called only by the interface contract."}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"project:/contracts/PermissionsImplementation.sol":"PermissionsImplementation"},"evmVersion":"byzantium","libraries":{},"optimizer":{"enabled":false,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"project:/contracts/AccountManager.sol":{"keccak256":"0x1ef71116f0bc8e36475aedd228e7b26dbae5aa048ba8051892c512c6c2aba7e2","urls":["bzzr://d845c86f7328a9a4de63c828718b0f2640a600172b07b8a0908fdbc9e760a063"]},"project:/contracts/NodeManager.sol":{"keccak256":"0x7ae9633d8ce793fa4330b0bd45eed1ed156b178f88b9a254c6fcc55e2a8441d3","urls":["bzzr://4d2e3661c7ceaf2a7928990afc6f9c5223eb24da87041dbe8d0c1c46a3cbd305"]},"project:/contracts/OrgManager.sol":{"keccak256":"0x54c3f1bf39eb5cd204c51f60ac9c4ec63437ae83e034af9336e162a2788ef60e","urls":["bzzr://546d4984e106034978be590c63ade3dc3da7fb904ccf31982d3be9801238e677"]},"project:/contracts/PermissionsImplementation.sol":{"keccak256":"0x8a8fbae5d91dd7a90904d66a4e4aa6183efe054b10dce8d30fb7c09ed42faffa","urls":["bzzr://f8953efe1800def8d39df93a9b260a5611a0758030d030a7217264e19c3e90e6"]},"project:/contracts/PermissionsInterface.sol":{"keccak256":"0x43f7940ec8749ee49c24289f0842a24df3fe71b5a015d2f9f9b8cfe8bdee5595","urls":["bzzr://0aa611d76ab3e07a01b6b53d321314a5511aecc6f9ae51579950d9f1b9ff41b6"]},"project:/contracts/PermissionsUpgradable.sol":{"keccak256":"0x27e5949e1c24f37159a8d88cacad61d71cce33c4a26cf3d9b7daeee5105a215a","urls":["bzzr://2666393b621fc9fff9e87fe1cf28bd9720ca6857f8dc946893e97c97d716a221"]},"project:/contracts/RoleManager.sol":{"keccak256":"0x7a5367367e3a5934aa8e680d174aecb96ad5f138e334d6293b1957a58cc4c686","urls":["bzzr://57584e68a8ce7b46ec53a0dbdf009ee51d3ee3ff79c676c6f276a6386e4af4d6"]},"project:/contracts/VoterManager.sol":{"keccak256":"0x7d4981c82fa9e251d29e1d87e8dcb7cee13e9665f8338a3013fbf3f45cb4b9c5","urls":["bzzr://e8452cce2588079337f0dd1d9d58110faef3f031a7a59b3869d1a7626f9c19d0"]}},"version":1}

addNewRole(string,string,uint256,bool,bo.details: account access type can have of the following four values: 0 - Read only 1 - value transfer 2 - contract deploy 3 - full access 4 - contract call 5 - value transfer and contract call 6 - value transfer and contract deploy 7 - contract call and deploy

params._access: account access type allowed for the role
params._admin: bool indicates if the role is an admin role
params._orgId: unique id of the organization to which the role belongs
params._voter: bool indicates if the role is voter role or not

params._enodeId: enode id being dded to the org
params._orgId: unique id of the organization to which the account belongs

params._account: account id. this will have the org admin privileges
params._enodeId: enode id linked to the organization
params._orgId: unique organization id

addSubOrg(string,string,string,string,ui.details: _enodeId is optional. parent org id should contain the complete org hierarchy from master org id to the immediate parent. The org hierarchy is separated by. For example, if master org ABC has a sub organization SUB1, then while creating the sub organization at SUB1 level, the parent org should be given as ABC.SUB1

params._enodeId: enode id linked to the sjb organization
params._orgId: unique id for the sub organization
params._pOrgId: parent org id under which the sub org is being added

params._orgId: unique id of the organization to which the account belongs

approveBlacklistedAccountRecovery(string.details: this function creates a voting record for other network admins to approve the operation. The recovery is complete only after majority voting

params._account: account id being dded to the org
params._orgId: unique id of the organization to which the account belongs

approveBlacklistedNodeRecovery(string,st.details: this function creates a voting record for other network admins to approve the operation. The recovery is complete only after majority voting

params._enodeId: enode id being dded to the org
params._orgId: unique id of the organization to which the account belongs

params._account: account id this will have the org admin privileges
params._enodeId: enode id linked to the organization
params._orgId: unique organization id

params._action: 1 for suspending an org and 2 for revoke of suspension
params._orgId: unique id for the sub organization
organization id to which the account belongs
params._roleId: role id to be assigned to the account

params._orgId: unique id of the organization to which the account belongs
params._roleId: role id to be assigned to the account

params._orgId: unique id of the organization to which the account belongs

getPolicyDetails().return: adminOrg admin org idadminRole default network admin roleorgAdminRole default org admin rolenetworkBoot network boot status

params._breadth: - number of sub orgs allowed at parent level
params._depth: - levels of sub org nesting allowed at parent level

params._orgId: organization id
unique id of the organization to which the role belongs

params._account: account id being dded to the org

addAdminAccount(address).notice: as a part of network initialization add all accounts which are passed via permission-config.json as network administrator accounts

addAdminNode(string,string,uint16,uint16.notice: as a part of network initialization add all nodes which are part of static-nodes.json as nodes belonging to network admin org

addNewRole(string,string,uint256,bool,bo.notice: function to add new role definition to an organization can be executed by the org admin account only

addNode(string,string,string,uint16,uint.notice: function to add a new node to the organization. can be invoked org admin account only

addOrg(string,string,string,uint16,uint1.notice: function to add a new organization to the network. creates org record and marks it as pending approval. adds the passed node node manager contract. adds the account with org admin role to account manager contracts. creates voting record for approval by other network admin accounts

addSubOrg(string,string,string,string,ui.notice: function to create a sub org under a given parent org.

approveAdminRole(string,address,address).notice: function to approve network admin/org admin role assigment this can be executed by network admin accounts only.

approveBlacklistedAccountRecovery(string.notice: function to initaite blacklisted nodes recovery. this can be invoked by an network admin account only

approveBlacklistedNodeRecovery(string,st.notice: function to initiate blacklisted nodes recovery. this can be invoked by an network admin account only

approveOrg(string,string,string,uint16,u.notice: functions to approve a pending approval org record by networ admin account. once majority votes are received the org is marked as approved

approveOrgStatus(string,uint256,address).notice: function to approve org status change. the org status is changed once the majority votes are received from network admin accounts.

assignAccountRole(address,string,string,.notice: function to assigns a role id to the account given account can be executed by org admin account only

assignAdminRole(string,address,string,ad.notice: function to assign network admin/org admin role to an account this can be executed by network admin accounts only. it assigns the role to the accounts and creates voting record for network admin accounts

connectionAllowed(string,string,uint16).notice: checks if the node is allowed to connect or not

methods.constructor: constructor accepts the contracts addresses of other deployed contracts of the permissions model

getNetworkBootStatus().notice: function to fetch network boot status

getPendingOp(string).notice: function to fetch detail of any pending approval activities for network admin organization

getPolicyDetails().notice: returns various permissions policy related parameters

init(uint256,uint256).notice: called at the time of network initialization. sets up network admin org with allowed sub org depth and breadth creates the network admin for the network admin org sets the default values required by account manager contract

isNetworkAdmin(address).notice: function to check if passed account is an network admin account

isOrgAdmin(address,string).notice: function to check if passed account is an org admin account

removeRole(string,string,address).notice: function to remove a role definition from an organization can be executed by the org admin account only

setMigrationPolicy(string,string,string,.notice: when migrating implementation contract, the values of these key values need to be set from the previous implementation contract. this function allows these values to be set

setPolicy(string,string,string).notice: for permissions its necessary to define the initial admin org id, network admin role id and default org admin role id. this sets these values at the time of network boot up

startBlacklistedAccountRecovery(string,a.notice: function to initaite blacklisted nodes recovery. this can be invoked by an network admin account only

startBlacklistedNodeRecovery(string,stri.notice: function to initiate blacklisted nodes recovery. this can be invoked by an network admin account only

transactionAllowed(address,address,uint2.notice: checks if the account is allowed to transact or not

updateAccountStatus(string,address,uint2.notice: function to update account status. can be executed by org admin account only.

updateNetworkBootStatus().notice: once the network initialization is complete, sets the network boot status to true

updateNodeStatus(string,string,string,ui.notice: function to update node status. can be invoked by org admin account only

updateOrgStatus(string,uint256,address).notice: function to update the org status. it updates the org status and adds a voting item for network admins to approve

validateAccount(address,string).notice: function to validate the account for access change operation

userdoc.notice: This contract holds implementation logic for all permissions related functionality. This can be called only by the interface contract.
